content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-87--83)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) for automation
- Output wooden chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10--6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters for automation
All drills currently out of fuel but positioned over iron resources

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters automating input/output
Connected by transport belt system

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5-4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles forming electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from invalid positions
- Ensure the target position contains the resource you're trying to extract
- Move within range of the resource before attempting extraction

### Errors with burner equipment running out of fuel
- Keep burner mining drills and inserters supplied with fuel (coal)
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems for continuous operation

### Errors with full storage blocking production
- Empty or expand storage capacity when chests become full
- Monitor chest contents and add more storage or processing capacity as needed
